House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00012
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE FILIPINO IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM
SHORT TITLE : Filipino Identification System Act
ABSTRACT : Provides for a system which will institutionalize the issuance of official identification for all citizens of the Republic of the Philippines and unify all existing government issued identification cards thus providing for a single card sufficient for all transactions requiring proof of identification with both the government and private sector.
